alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 09 at 4:42PM MST until September 09 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Arizona and southeast Arizona, including the following counties, in south central Arizona, Maricopa. In southeast Arizona, Pinal. * WHEN...Until 745 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 442 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Gila River, Waterman Wash, Dickey Wash, Sauceda Wash, Hassayampa River, Arlington Canal, Enterprise Canal, Centennial Wash, Lum Wash, West Prong Waterman Wash, Winters Wash, Woolsey Wash, Fourmile Wash, Bender Wash and Rainbow Wash. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, Gila Bend, Estrella, Cotton Center, Painted Rock Dam, Palo Verde, Bosque, Sonoran National Monument, Palo Verde Nuclear Generation Station, Wintersburg, Estrella Sailport, Arlington, Rainbow Valley, Hassayampa and Mobile. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
